summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 2559, for the improvement of the alley in block 13, Capitol Hill Addition, Division No. 2, all in the City of Seattle, by paving the same with asphalt to conform to the present improvements, under Ordinance No. 29677 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
